title: Blinkit
description: A full-stack grocery delivery clone built using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Features user authentication, cart management, and responsive UI for seamless user experience.

title: Code Editor
description: A browser-based code editor that supports HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Allows users to write, preview, and test code in real-time with a clean and intuitive interface

title: Screen Recorder
description: A simple yet effective screen recording web application built with React. Enables users to record their screen activities and download the recording in video format.

title: Screen Capture
description: A React-based utility that allows users to take high-quality screenshots of their screen directly from the browser with customizable capture settings.
